trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around April 25th 2012
Summary: Heard loud roaring noise and looked up and saw object going at a very high rate of speed go directly over house north west bound and then make sharp turns side to side then veer left before dissapearing over the trees.
divs: sighting detailswas at home on night of 4\25\2012 when we heard a loud roaring noise and looked up and saw a large hazy glowing and flat rectangular shaped object going at a very high rate of speed go directly over the house north west bound and then make sharp turns side to side then veer left before dissapearing over the trees. my initial feeling was that it was not a helicopter or airplane which i frequently see on a daily\nightly baisis here. never have seen somthing like this before.
